rev_head: SO much better than my old HP laptop!
revs: I had a business class HP laptop for the past 3 years, and while it was dependable and easy to use, it seemed that every time it got a Windows update, something else stopped working properly.
Hp  chrome book laptop is a nice piece of equipment. I will cherish it for years. Thank you amazon.
